paint

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all methods related to file and undo/redo functionality.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileManager()
      Default constructor.
      FileManager(java.lang.String autosaveFile, java.lang.String[] imgFormats)
      Constructor for autosave file and possible image formats.
